splash.beta_text:
DO NOT USE THIS FOR ANYTHING IMPORTANT

Until 1.0 is released:

• You should have no expectations of actual privacy, or guarantees of security.
• You will likely lose accounts, contacts, and messages and need to recreate them.

Please read our BETA PARTICIPATION GUIDE located here:

new_account_page.instructions: This information will be shared with the people you invite to connect with you on VeilidChat.
new_account_page.name: Name

edit_account_page.instructions: This information will be shared with the people you invite to connect with you on VeilidChat.
edit_account_page.name: Name
edit_account_page.remove_account_description: Remove account from this device only
edit_account_page.remove_account_confirm_message:
• Your account will be removed from this device ONLY
 • Your identity will remain recoverable with the recovery key
 • Your messages and contacts will remain available on other devices
edit_account_page.destroy_account_description: Destroy account, removing it completely from all devices everywhere
edit_account_page.destroy_account_confirm_message: This action is PERMANENT, and your VeilidChat account will no longer be recoverable with the recovery key. Restoring from backups will not recover your account!
edit_account_page.destroy_account_confirm_message_details:
You will lose access to:
 • Your entire message history
 • Your contacts
 • This will not remove your messages you have sent from other people's devices
edit_account_page.confirm_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to do this?
edit_account_page.failed_to_remove:
Failed to remove account.

Try again when you have a more stable network connection.
edit_account_page.failed_to_destroy:
Failed to destroy account.

Try again when you have a more stable network connection.

show_recovery_key_page.instructions_details: This key is the ONLY way to recover your VeilidChat account in the event of a forgotton password or a lost, stolen, or compromised device.
show_recovery_key_page.instructions_options: Here are some options for your recovery key:
show_recovery_key_page.instructions_print: Print the recovery key and keep it somewhere safe
show_recovery_key_page.instructions_view: View the recovery key and take a screenshot
show_recovery_key_page.instructions_share: Share the recovery key to another app to save it

create_invitation_dialog.title: Create Contact Invitation
create_invitation_dialog.message_to_contact: Message to send with invitation (not encrypted)
create_invitation_dialog.note_text: Contact invitations can be used by anyone. Make sure you send the invitation to your contact over a secure medium, and preferably use a password or pin to ensure that they are the only ones who can unlock the invitation and accept it.
create_invitation_dialog.pin_description:
Choose a PIN to protect the contact invite.

This level of security is appropriate only for casual connections in public environments for 'shoulder surfing' protection.
create_invitation_dialog.password_description:
Choose a strong password to protect the contact invite.

This level of security is appropriate when you must be sure the contact invitation is only accepted by its intended recipient. Share this password over a different medium than the invite itself.
